Interface iHomeController

All Known Implementing Classes:
HomeAdapter, HomeController
public interface iHomeController
Interface representing the controller of the HomeStage class in the view

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    handlePlay()
    Method which handle the event of clicking the playButton button by printing a string in the text field only if the boolean validWord is true
    void
    handleWordInTextField()
    Method which uses the Checks class to verify if the string input is a legal one (this is, if it doesn't have blank spaces, if it only has the spanish letters and the legal symbols and if it has eight letters or more)

  • Method Details

    • handleWordInTextField

      void handleWordInTextField()
      Method which uses the Checks class to verify if the string input is a legal one (this is, if it doesn't have blank spaces, if it only has the spanish letters and the legal symbols and if it has eight letters or more)
      See Also:
      • Checks.allChecks()

    • handlePlay

      void handlePlay()
      Method which handle the event of clicking the playButton button by printing a string in the text field only if the boolean validWord is true
